lyrics.text:
’Oku fuonounou
‘Etau mo’ui ni,
Pea fonu ia foki
‘I he ‘ahi’ahi.

He ko hotau sino
Ko e me’a vaivai,
Hoko hono tupu’anga
Ko e kelekele.

Pea ka pekia
‘A hotau sino ni
‘E ‘alu mei ai leva
‘A e laumālie.

’E ‘alu ‘o lelei
‘A e angatonu,
Kae ‘alu ki he kovi
‘A e angahala.

Ke tau manavahē
Ki hotau ‘Otua,
Pea ke tau teuteu atu
Ki he ‘etau mate.
